events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills in software development.
A recruiter from our Engineering hiring team has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process.
Your profile has successfully passed the initial screening, and we are interested in moving forward with technical assessments.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the next steps in the technical interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th, where our senior developers will evaluate your coding skills.
You have completed the technical interview with positive feedback on problem-solving ability and coding proficiency.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 25th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
You successfully completed the HR interview, and we believe you would be a great fit within our Engineering department.
An offer has been proposed to you for the Software Engineer role including salary details and employment terms.
We received your feedback expressing enthusiasm about the offer and eagerness to join the team.
You have accepted the job offer and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our Engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, with initial orientation and access to our development resources.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially part of the Engineering team.
